document.full_text: col. muammar el-qaddafi survived an airstrike that killed his youngest son and three grandchildren, a spokesman said sunday, in a sharp intensification of the nato campaign against the libyan leader.
document.title: qaddafi is said to survive nato airstrike that kills son
lines_and_colors: col. muammar el-qaddafi survived an airstrike that killed his youngest son and three grandchildren, a spokesman said sunday, in a sharp intensification of the nato campaign against the libyan leader.
